name: White Cliffs VR Music Visualizer
description:
Welcome to the White Cliffs VR Music Visualizer! Serving up some saucy Virtual Reality jams. Compatible with or without a VR headset. Step into VR and vibe out.


In this app you can listen to the new single “Come Here” while a 3D music visualizer reacts in tune to the music! This is compatible with Google Cardboard and also works as a standalone handheld mode App.


Check out more at soundcloud.com/whitecliffs
